General.Name: Chewathai Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chewathai Public Company Limited develops and sells residential projects in Thailand. It develops and sells houses, town homes, home offices, and condominium projects. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Chewathai Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chartchewa Company Limited.
